member.name: DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_GRANULARITY
member.summary: Identifies the granularity at which the graphics processing unit (GPU) can be preempted from performing its current compute task.

member.name: DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_GRANULARITY.DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_DMA_BUFFER_BOUNDARY
member.summary: Indicates the preemption granularity as a compute packet.

member.name: DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_GRANULARITY.DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_DISPATCH_BOUNDARY
member.summary: Indicates the preemption granularity as a dispatch (for example, a call to the method). A dispatch is a part of a compute packet.

member.name: DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_GRANULARITY.DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_THREAD_GROUP_BOUNDARY
member.summary: Indicates the preemption granularity as a thread group. A thread group is a part of a dispatch.

member.name: DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_GRANULARITY.DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_THREAD_BOUNDARY
member.summary: Indicates the preemption granularity as a thread in a thread group. A thread is a part of a thread group.

member.name: DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_GRANULARITY.DXGI_COMPUTE_PREEMPTION_INSTRUCTION_BOUNDARY
member.summary: Indicates the preemption granularity as a compute instruction in a thread.
